step.step_xml:
<label name="name"/>
<field name="name"/>
<label name="status"/>
<field name="status"/>
<label name="claimant"/>
<field name="claimant"/>
<label name="reopened_reason"/>
<field name="reopened_reason"/>
<label name="main_contract"/>
<field name="main_contract"/>

<label name="name"/>
<field name="name"/>
<label name="status"/>
<group id="status" col="5">
<field name="status"/>
<label name="sub_status"/>
<field name="sub_status"/>
</group>
<label name="claimant"/>
<field name="claimant"/>
<label name="declaration_date"/>
<field name="declaration_date"/>
<label name="reopened_reason"/>
<field name="reopened_reason"/>
<label name="main_contract"/>
<field name="main_contract"/>
<field name="losses" colspan="4" mode="form,tree" view_ids="_extra_views.step_loss_loss_form,insurance_claim.loss_view_tree"/>
<group id="contracts" states="{'invisible': True}">
<field name="possible_contracts"/>
</group>

<label name="name"/>
<field name="name"/>
<label name="status"/>
<group id="status">
<field name="status"/>
<label name="sub_status"/>
<field name="sub_status"/>
</group>
<label name="claimant"/>
<field name="claimant"/>
<label name="declaration_date"/>
<field name="declaration_date"/>
<label name="main_contract"/>
<field name="main_contract"/>
  <notebook>
    <page string="Losses" id="losses">
      <field name="losses" group="prestations_multi_losses" mode="tree" view_ids="insurance_claim.loss_simple_tree" xexpand="0" xfill="0"/>
      <field name="losses" group="prestations_multi_losses" mode="form" relation="ins_claim.loss" relation_field="claim" view_ids="insurance_claim.loss_view_form"/>
      <field name="losses" group="prestations_multi_losses" mode="form" relation="ins_contract.delivered_service" relation_field="loss" view_ids="insurance_claim.delivered_service_view_form"/>
      <field name="losses" group="prestations_multi_losses" mode="form" relation="ins_claim.indemnification" relation_field="delivered_service" view_ids="insurance_claim.indemnification_view_form"/>
    </page>
    <page string="Documents" id="documents">
      <field name="documents" xexpand="1" xfill="1" yexpand="1" yfill="1" mode="form" />
    </page>
  </notebook>
<!--
<field name="losses" colspan="4" mode="form,tree" expand_toolbar="0" view_ids="insurance_claim_process.loss_delivered_services_view_form,insurance_claim.loss_view_tree"/>-->
<field name="doc_received" invisible="1"/>

<label name="name"/>
<field name="name"/>
<label name="status"/>
<group id="status">
<field name="status"/>
<label name="sub_status"/>
<field name="sub_status"/>
</group>
<label name="claimant"/>
<field name="claimant"/>
<label name="declaration_date"/>
<field name="declaration_date"/>
<label name="main_contract"/>
<field name="main_contract"/>
  <notebook>
    <page string="Losses" id="losses">
      <field name="losses" group="indemn_multi_losses" mode="tree" view_ids="insurance_claim.loss_simple_tree" xexpand="0" xfill="0"/>
      <field name="losses" group="indemn_multi_losses" mode="form" relation="ins_claim.loss" relation_field="claim" view_ids="insurance_claim.loss_view_form"/>
      <field name="losses" group="indemn_multi_losses" mode="form" relation="ins_contract.delivered_service" relation_field="loss" view_ids="insurance_claim.delivered_service_view_form"/>
      <field name="losses" group="indemn_multi_losses" mode="form" relation="ins_claim.indemnification" relation_field="delivered_service" view_ids="insurance_claim.indemnification_view_form"/>
    </page>
    <page string="Documents" id="documents">
      <field name="documents" xexpand="1" xfill="1" yexpand="1" yfill="1" mode="form" />
    </page>
  </notebook>
<!--
<field name="indemnifications" colspan="4" mode="form,tree" expand_toolbar="0" />-->
<field name="is_pending_indemnification"/>

<label name="name"/>
<field name="name"/>
<label name="status"/>
<group id="status">
<field name="status"/>
<label name="sub_status"/>
<field name="sub_status"/>
</group>
<label name="claimant"/>
<field name="claimant"/>
<label name="declaration_date"/>
<field name="declaration_date"/>
<label name="main_contract"/>
<field name="main_contract"/>
  <notebook>
    <page string="Losses" id="losses">
      <field name="losses" group="closing_multi_losses" mode="tree" view_ids="insurance_claim.loss_simple_tree" xexpand="0" xfill="0"/>
      <field name="losses" group="closing_multi_losses" mode="form" relation="ins_claim.loss" relation_field="claim" view_ids="insurance_claim.loss_view_form"/>
      <field name="losses" group="closing_multi_losses" mode="form" relation="ins_contract.delivered_service" relation_field="loss" view_ids="insurance_claim.delivered_service_view_form"/>
      <field name="losses" group="closing_multi_losses" mode="form" relation="ins_claim.indemnification" relation_field="delivered_service" view_ids="insurance_claim.indemnification_view_form"/>
    </page>
    <page string="Documents" id="documents">
      <field name="documents" xexpand="1" xfill="1" yexpand="1" yfill="1" mode="form" />
    </page>
  </notebook>
<!--
<field name="indemnifications" colspan="4" mode="form,tree" expand_toolbar="0" />-->
<newline/>

<field name="is_pending_indemnification"/>-->
